title: Lesa Parakkuthu Lyrics Vennila Kabadi Kuzhu
stanzas: <div>Lesa Parakkuthu Lyrics Vennila Kabadi Kuzhu

Kadhal pirakkindra
paruvam paruvam.
mounam purikindra
tharunam tharunam.
kangal kalakkindra
nimidam nimidam
kaalgal thodarkindra
nadanam nadanam.

Lesa parakkuthu
manasu manasu
edho nadakkudhu vayasula.

Lesa nazhuvudhu
kolusu kolusu
engae vizhunthadhu theriyala.

Sundeli valaiyila nellapol
undha nenappa
enakkulla serkkura.

allipoo kuzhathula
kalla pol undhan
kanvizhi thaakkida
suththi suththi ninnen.

karachaan kuruvikku
mayakkam mayakkam.
kanavula thinamum
medhakkum medhakkum
kadhal vandhathum
kudhikkum kudhikkum
siragaal vaanathai
idikkum idikkum.

Lesa parakkuthu
manasu manasu
edho nadakkudhu vayasula.

Lesa nazhuvudhu
kolusu kolusu
engae vizhunthadhu theriyala.

thaththi thaththi pogum
pachcha pulla pola
poththi vachchuthaane
manasu irundhadhu.
thiruvizhaa koottathil
tholaiyira sugamaa.

thondakuli thaandi
vaartha varavilla
ennennavo pesa
udhadu nenachathu
paarvaiya paarthadhum
idhamaa patharudhu.

raathiri pagalaa thaan
nenjil raatinam suthuthadi.
poottuna veettulathaan
pudhusa pattaampoochi
parakkudhadaa..

karachaan kuruvikku
mayakkam mayakkam.
kanavula thinamum
medhakkum medhakkum
kadhal vandhathum
kudhikkum kudhikkum
siragaal vaanathai
idikkum idikkum.

Lesa parakkuthu
manasu manasu
edho nadakkudhu vayasula.

poovaa viriyira ulagam ulagam
tharisaa kedanthadhu idhuvara

poththa maram pola
seththu kedanthanae
unna paartha pinne
usuru polachadhu.
sondhamaa kidaippiyaa
saamiya kaetpen.

retta jada potu
thulli thirinjene
unna paatha pinne
vetkam koranjathe.
unakkuthaan unakkuthan
boomiyil porandhaen.

kaavadi sumappathu pol
manasu kadhala
sumakkuthadaa.

kanavula nee varuva
adhanaal kannu
thoonguthadi.

karachaan kuruvikku
mayakkam mayakkam.
kanavula thinamum
medhakkum medhakkum
kadhal vandhathum
kudhikkum kudhikkum
siragaal vaanathai
idikkum idikkum.
